name: Dr. Santosh Kondekar- DNB
Description: Dr. Santosh Kondekar is a Pediatrician in Dadar West, Mumbai and has an experience of 23 years in this field. Dr. Santosh Kondekar practices at Shushrusha Citizens Co-Operative Hospital in Dadar West, Mumbai. He completed MBBS from King Edward Memorial Hospital and Seth Gordhandas Sunderdas Medical College in 1997,MD - Pediatrics from King Edward Memorial Hospital and Seth Gordhandas Sunderdas Medical College in 2002 and DNB from DNB board, New Delhi in 2003.

name: Dr. Amit Vatkar- DNB
Description: Dr. Amit Vatkar is a Pediatric Neurologist and has completed his fellowship in Pediatric Neurology with specializing in Epilepsy surgery workup from Hinduja hospital under the guidance of Vrajesh Udani, top neurologist in India. He has also been trained in Epilepsy & neurophysiology at Casewestern Reserve University at Cleveland under the guidance of Dr. Hans Luders. He specializes in Clinical Neurophysiology (EEG, EMG and NCV). He also provides portable EEG services in Navi Mumbai. His areas of expertise are 1. Epilepsy, Seizure disorders 2. Developmental Disorders including delayed speech, motor milestones, and coordination issues 3. Autism and other Behavioral disorders, including attention-deficit/hyperactivity disorder (ADHD), school failure and sleep problems 4. Movement Disorders, 5. Cerebral palsy, muscular dystrophy, and nervemuscle disorders 6. Headaches, including migraines

name: Dr. Rahul Gupta- DM
Description: Dr. Rahul R Gupta did his DM in Cardiology from KEM hospital Mumbai which is one of the premiere institutes in India after which he further enhanced his expertise by attending various advanced training courses abroad as well as in India and has wide experience in dealing with all forms of heart diseases including coronary, rheumatic, congenital, pericardial, cardiomyopathies & rhythm disturbances. During his training he received the RESIDENT DOCTOR AWARD and Shankar Dayal Sharma Gold Medal.He was a topper in his college in both DM Cardiology & MD medicine university exams. He also bagged the Young Scholar Award at a national level competition during his residency. He has attended & presented papers in various national & international conferences. His expertise includes primary angioplasty, complex angioplasties, intravascular and FFR guided angioplasty, Peripheral interventions Pacemakers, AICD, ASD & PDA device closure (closing holes in heart without open heart surgery), balloon valvotomy. Besides interventions his fields of special interests are preventive cardiology & stem cell therapy for management of cardiovascular disorders. Dr Gupta also expertise in Congenital heart disease echocardiography including pediatric, neonatal & Fetal echo

name: Dr. Chandrashekhar Kulkarni- M.Ch
Description: Among the finest Cardiologists in the city, Dr. Chandrashekhar Kulkarni Cardiac Surgeon in Parel, Mumbai is known for offering excellent patient care. The clinic is located centrally in Parel, a prominent locality in the city. It stands close to Parel which not only makes it convenient for people from the vicinity to consult the doctor but also for those from other neighbourhoods to seek medical guidance. There is no dearth of public modes of transport to reach the clinic from all major areas of the city.

name: Dr. Gaurav Gupta- M.Ch
Description: Dr. Gaurav Gupta is an eminent Cardiothoracic & Vascular surgeon, who has a vast experience of two decades, in all complex Cardiovascular and Thoracic procedures. These include Surgical treatment of Adult Heart Disease, Paediatric(Congenital)Heart Disease, Beating Heart surgery, Arterial Revascularization, Complex Re-Operations, Valve Replacement and Repairs, Surgery of Aorta and Arch, Thoraco-Abdominal Aneurysms, Aorto-Bifemoral Bypass, Fem-Pop Bypass, Distal Bypass Procedures, Carotid Endarterectomies, AV Fistula, Decortication, Mediastinoscopy and Mediastinal Tumor Excision. He also treats Venous disorders like Varicose Veins and Deep Vein Thrombosis. He has a large experience of dealing with a variety of Chest and Vascular Trauma. He has keen interest in academics and has been involved in Teaching at Undergraduate, Postgraduate and Doctoral levels. He has presented and authored papers and has been involved in conferences and OPDs in India, and abroad as well. He has special Interest in Cardiac Transplants, Assist Devices and ECMOs, TAVI, Endovascular & Hybrid Procedures. He has been trained at the All India Institute of Medical Sciences(AIIMS), New Delhi, which is the premier medical institution in South-East Asia, known worldwide for its state-of-the-art facilities, and experienced and renowned faculty

name: Dr. Prajct Sao- MD
Description: Dr. Sao is a highly experienced and recommended Dermatologist in central Mumbai with vast experience of 13 years. Not only is he an expert in solving skin problems faced in day to day life but also specializes in skin care treatments and enhancement procedures required in the new age. Hair care and treatments of hair loss is his specialty. He is an extremely sought after Hair transplant surgeon (FUE surgeries) and has completed more than 1100 plus surgeries till date and his satisfied clientele includes Indians and Expats alike. As a senior transplant surgeon, he also trains doctors wanting to acquire skills of hair transplant surgeries and conducts workshops from time to time.

name: Dr. Abhishek Arun Jaiswal- MD Med
Description: Dr. Abhishek Arun Jaiswal is a Diabetologist in Indira Nagar, Lucknow and has an experience of 10 years in this field. Dr. Abhishek Arun Jaiswal practices at Vishudh Diabetes Clinic in Indira Nagar, Lucknow. He completed MBBS from Manipal College of Medical Sciences (MCOMS) in 2009,MD - General Medicine from Perak Medical College in 2015 and M.Med from Christian Medical College & Hospital, Vellore in 2015. He is a member of Indian Medical Association (IMA),Association of Physicians of India,I.A.P.S.M,Association Of Family Physicians (AFPI),Research Society for the Study of Diabetes in India (RSSDI) and Indian Medical Association - College Of General Physicians (IMA - CGP). Some of the services provided by the doctor are: Diabetes Management,Infectious Disease Treatment,Preventive Medicine,Diabetes in Children and Insulin Treatment etc.

name: Dr. Paras Agarwal- MD
Description: Dr. Paras Agarwal is a Diabetologist in Indira Nagar, Lucknow and has an experience of 10 years in this field. Dr. Abhishek Arun Jaiswal practices at Vishudh Diabetes Clinic in Indira Nagar, Lucknow. He completed MBBS from Manipal College of Medical Sciences (MCOMS) in 2009,MD - General Medicine from Perak Medical College in 2015 and M.Med from Christian Medical College & Hospital, Vellore in 2015. He is a member of Indian Medical Association (IMA),Association of Physicians of India,I.A.P.S.M,Association Of Family Physicians (AFPI),Research Society for the Study of Diabetes in India (RSSDI) and Indian Medical Association - College Of General Physicians (IMA - CGP). Some of the services provided by the doctor are: Diabetes Management,Infectious Disease Treatment,Preventive Medicine,Diabetes in Children and Insulin Treatment etc.
